title: Diamond Player looking for a team
body: Im a pretty chilled guy, want to join a team and have some fun. I dont mind filling, i can play pretty much every champ in a competitive way, i have a wide knowledge about the game. Obviously i play to win, dont get me wrong :) i just dont rage quit everytime i lose a game, is all about getting better as a team :)

replies.body:
mid/top lately, been spamming every position along my lol career
adjust according to the meta top tier champs
Add me on Hello im yoshi, or Im yoshi or Koopa yoshi.
